entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a free elf who has passed away. Harry wants to mark his grave with a stone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is marking Dobby's grave with a stone.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione could have done the task more neatly and quickly than Harry.

entities.name: rock
entities.description: The rock is where Dobby's head rests. Harry uses it to mark Dobby's grave with a stone.

entities.name: stone
entities.description: Harry marks Dobby's grave with a stone that reads: 'HERE LIES DOBBY, A FREE ELF.'

relationships.description: Harry is burying Dobby by marking his grave with a stone.
